name: Fun For Four Fireworks
description:
Description

Fun for four fireworks is a quick, precise and enjoyable top-down action game, in which the player helps to make the apocalypse happen. Get ready to take control over the Horsemen of the Apocalypse, creating chaos and unleashing souls of the damned, in a quest to obtain energizing and much needed jam. 

Controlls

It is a singleplayer game, the controls are: 

WASD - moving the characters, 

left-click - using characters spell, 

scroll/numbers from 1 to 4/right-click - choosing the character. 

Credits

Game by: Lead, code, design - Miłosz Kawczyński 

Art, design, audio design, testing - Julia Pietrzykowska 

Emotional support - Tadek the turtwig
